data.name: Days Gone By
data.detailed_description:
Days Gone By tries to endevour a striking expierence getting back that simpleton feeling of the long gone scrolling genre.
Providing a mesh up of levels where timing and awareness are essential for completing the game levels, it tries to strike every kind of Player.
No respawn, no second chance, no power-ups, no buff and no maps to help you it's a one way journey to a tale told many times and never truly forgotten.
A dozen of levels to face and beat and you will take on a magic king to arrival.
AND NOW A FRACKING HUGE SWORD!

Available on Windows PC, Macs, Linux based platforms and SteamOS machines.
Purchasing the game gives you access no matter which the aforementioned system you are using.
Buy the package and you can play wherever you are!

Enjoy!

data.short_description: Standard Platform Game developed following a tile to tile mindset with the Godot Engine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 1 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires Steam client
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
